channel.title: Help getting rid of player shops
channel.description: Hi I need help for some reason at duel arena is has challenge and duel works and in wild it had attack and it works but this is on a play when they are not in wild or duel http://i48.tinypic.com/282j89h.png when you click challenge on them it opens a player shop how do I remove this option off a player but still have duel and wild work and I also want to remove players having there own shop how would I do this?

item.title: Help getting rid of player shops
item.dc:creator: @darkageisme darkageisme
item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

Hi I need help for some reason at duel arena is has challenge and duel works and in wild it had attack and it works but this is on a play when they are not in wild or duel http://i48.tinypic.com/282j89h.png
when you click challenge on them it opens a player shop how do I remove this option off a player but still have duel and wild work and I also want to remove players having there own shop how would I do this?

Read full topic
